RENT_TITLE: Rental and servicing of skis / snowboards
RENT_DESCRIPTION: The offer for rent includes ski equipment from renowned brands Atomic, Salomon, Rossignol and Dynastar. We rent high-quality, high-performance skis for skiers of all skill levels, from beginners to professionals. We regularly service the equipment for skiing and snowboarding that we rent. Maintenance is done in our ski service, on modern Reichmann machines. In this way, we ensure good control even on icy slopes, the safety of skiers and easier mastering of skiing elements.
